title: Awa Cuaiquer (2010) New Testament
description: Awa Cuaiquer translation of the New Testament by Wycliffe Bible Translators. Awa Cuaiquer is a tribal language spoken along the Andes Mountains.

language.name: Awa-Cuaiquer
language.area: Pacific slopes of Andes, Nariño, from Ecuador border north, near Barbacoas. Also in Ecuador.
